sentences.sContent: He can’t possibly get that finished in time. He must be mad !
sentences.sCn: 他不可能按时完成的。他一定是疯了！

sentences.sContent: I’d go mad (= start to feel crazy ) if I was stuck at home all day.
sentences.sCn: 如果我整天困在家里我会发疯的。

sentences.sContent: You’ve agreed to marry him! Are you mad?
sentences.sCn: 你已经同意跟他结婚了！你疯了吗？

sentences.sContent: Surely no one would be mad enough to fly in this weather?
sentences.sCn: 肯定没有人会傻到在这样的天气条件下飞行吧？

sentences.sContent: My friends all think I’m stark raving mad (= completely crazy ) .
sentences.sCn: 我的朋友都认为我是彻底疯了。

sentences.sContent: It’s enough to send you barking mad (= completely crazy ) .
